articles.title: Hampton Roads Regional inmate, 25, dies at hospital
articles.description: PORTSMOUTH — A 25-year-old inmate at the Hampton Roads Regional Jail has died while being treated at a hospital.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Teenage inmate dies at Hampton Roads Regional Jail
articles.description: PORTSMOUTH — Authorities at the Hampton Roads Regional Jail say they're investigating the death of an 18-year-old inmate.

articles.title: Portsmouth jail inmate, 25, dies at hospital
articles.description: PORTSMOUTH, Va. (AP) — A 25-year-old inmate at the Hampton Roads Regional Jail has died while being treated at a hospital.

articles.author: By The Associated Press
articles.title: Hampton Roads Regional inmate's estate sues jail, alleging wrongful death
articles.description: NORFOLK — The estate of an inmate who died at Hampton Roads Regional Jail has filed a lawsuit seeking $13.85 million in damages, alleging negligence, deprivation of rights and wrongful death.

articles.author: By PATRICK WILSON Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: Cases closed by state jail death investigator aren't public
articles.description: RICHMOND, Va. (AP) — A new state jail death investigator reviewing cases back to July 1 has closed 17 while 36 remain pending, including the death of an 18-year-old on May 15 in the Hampton Roads Regional Jail.

articles.author: BY PATRICK WILSON Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: State jail death investigator closing cases, but information isn't public
articles.description: A new state jail death investigator reviewing cases back to July 1 has closed 17 while 36 remain pending, including the death of an 18-year-old on Tuesday in the Hampton Roads Regional Jail.

articles.author: By Yasmine Jumaa and Irena Schunn Capital News Service
articles.title: Virginia jails struggle to help mentally ill inmates
articles.description: RICHMOND, Va. (AP) — Arrested for taking $5 in snacks from a convenience store, Jamycheal Mitchell was placed in a cell in the Hampton Roads Regional Jail in Portsmouth. Authorities planned to send Mitchell, who suffered from schizophrenia, to a…

articles.author: BY MARK BOWES Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: Four inmates have died so far this year in custody at Riverside Regional Jail, one of highest counts in the state
articles.description: Four people have died so far this year while in the custody of Riverside Regional Jail, a number that is among the highest in Virginia for a local or regional jail.

articles.title: Head of beleaguered Virginia jail steps down after 1 year
articles.description: PORTSMOUTH, Va. (AP) — After a year on the job, the superintendent of a Virginia jail under federal investigation has stepped down.

articles.title: Virginia inmate's estate sues jail alleging wrongful death
articles.description: NORFOLK, Va. (AP) — The estate of an inmate who died at a Virginia jail has filed a lawsuit seeking nearly $14 million in damages for allegations including wrongful death.

articles.title: Virginia jail is investigating death of 18-year-old inmate
articles.description: PORTSMOUTH, Va. (AP) — Authorities at a jail in Virginia say they're investigating the death of an 18-year-old inmate.

articles.title: Head of beleaguered Virginia jail steps down after 1 year
articles.description: PORTSMOUTH, Va. (AP) — After a year on the job, the superintendent of a Virginia jail under federal investigation has stepped down.

articles.title: Virginia inmate's estate sues jail alleging wrongful death
articles.description: NORFOLK, Va. (AP) — The estate of an inmate who died at a Virginia jail has filed a lawsuit seeking nearly $14 million in damages for allegations including wrongful death.

articles.author: By K. BURNELL EVANS Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: Virginia jail investigator, policy analyst envisioned in reform bill started work this week
articles.description: A Virginia Department of Corrections employee picked to boost oversight of Virginia’s local and regional jails in the wake of high-profile deaths said Wednesday that his reviews of critical incidents will also look “for what’s being done right.”

articles.author: BY K. BURNELL EVANS Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: Virginia Board of Corrections has yet to begin reviewing jail deaths, 109 days after it became law
articles.description: Although 109 days have passed since the state Board of Corrections became legally responsible for overseeing jail death investigations, the newly reconstituted board has yet to launch a single probe.

articles.author: By K. BURNELL EVANS Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: Legislative watchdog to scrutinize Virginia agency tasked with ferreting out waste, fraud and abuse
articles.description: Lawmakers dissatisfied with answers about whether the state’s top watchdog agency should be able to investigate jail deaths have requested a top-to-bottom review of the Office of the State Inspector General.

articles.author: BY ROBERT ZULLO Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: 19 protesters issues summonses after anti-pipeline demonstration outside Virginia DEQ main office
articles.description: Dozens of demonstrators, taking aim at how the Virginia Department of Environmental Quality has handled water quality permitting for a pair of controversial natural gas pipelines, blockaded the agency's office in downtown Richmond during a peaceful protest Th…

articles.description: Dozens of demonstrators, taking aim at how the Virginia Department of Environmental Quality has handled water quality permitting for a pair of controversial natural gas pipelines, blockaded the agency's office in downtown Richmond during a peaceful protest Th…

articles.author: By JONATHAN EDWARDS The Virginian-Pilot
articles.title: Suspect in teacher's slaying described as loving, smart boss
articles.description: NORFOLK, Va. (AP) — Ed Shaw was one of the best bosses Graysen Fox ever had: smart, supportive and unrelentingly optimistic, a father figure who mentored him at work and gave his kids toys for Christmas.

articles.author: By PATRICK WILSON Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: Democrat Melissa Dart, Republican John McGuire in running to succeed Del. Peter Farrell, R-Henrico
articles.description: Thursday was a magnificent evening in Goochland County. Stars were visible in the clear sky and children played football on a school field under the lights, a snap of cold in the air.
